containerDefinitions.name: simple-db-fix
command: echo "$DATABASE_URL" | sed 's/postgresql+asyncpg:/postgresql:/' | sed 's/@[^/]*/@/' > /tmp/db_url && export PGURL=$(cat /tmp/db_url) && psql "$PGURL" -c "INSERT INTO alembic_version (version_num) VALUES ('499278ad9251') ON CONFLICT (version_num) DO NOTHING;" && psql "$PGURL" -c "SELECT version_num FROM alembic_version ORDER BY version_num;" && echo 'Migration fix completed successfully'
